oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ||kabbo (Jantje) goes on a journey in a train to Simonstown. He meets a woman who stops him from falling out of the train, as well as a black man and a white man, each of whom he describes. The black man asks him where he comes from and he answers that his place is the 'Bitterpits'. 1) This story is found in Book II.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||kabbo (Jantje) in the train
